title: Base
description: This is the Base schema for Brickchain documents. All Brickchain documents use this as its base, and includes all fields from the base document.

@type.description: Document type as URI, subtype after '#'

@timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the document was created

@id.description: A unique identifier of the document (uuid)

@certificate.description: The certificate chain that was used as proof of current signature

@realm.description: The name of the realm that issued this document
